oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Alice Josephine Hopper Allen, circa 1950
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of Alice Josephine Hopper Allen at an Eastern Star event in Clinton, Tenn. in the late 1940s or early 1950s. She wears a long gown, the top half is satin with short sleeves.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Allen, Alice Josephine Hopper, 1914-1990
Order of the Eastern Star
Portrait photographs; African Americans; Women; African Americans--Societies, etc.--Tennessee; African Americans--Women--Tennessee; Clubwomen--Tennessee
Clinton (Tenn.)
